Text:
Thanks! Thunderball is home now.
Spartacus is shrinked. However I don't stripp any audio tracks or subtitles. I hope you will enjoy it.

Oh, I have it already, but in single disk DL version. It was just the extras that interested me... That the reason why I only work with original. If you want something, just make a note on my last upload and I'll see what I can do! I have 6500 to choose from.

//Scratzz
Just to avoid confusion. Spartacus is ul as two iso files. Both are shrinked to fit for easy burning. But I never strip anything except for warnings when possible.
